title: SOPHIE (PC Music) fonts
author: SoDamnCold

comments.content:
Could only find on vaguely similar:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/polymorph/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317191121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/polymorph/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/polymorph/")

Some letters are from Lino (Walt) - or others by Radim Pesko

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317191121im_/http:/typophile.com/files/north1_5062.jpg)
  
 [http://www.radimpesko.com/fonts/lyno](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317191121/http:/www.radimpesko.com/fonts/lyno)
Well done, Mr. Pape. It seems the designer mixed and matched the four variations of Lyno to typeset the poster. All the characters can be found in that one typeface.
